messages.zh: ♪你是否听闻一声惊雷？
messages.en: ♪Have you heard of a thunder?

messages.zh: ♪雨成帘，不见山
messages.en: ♪Rain pouring down, obscuring the mountains

messages.zh: ♪我早已忘记是何人何物
messages.en: ♪I have long forgotten who and what

messages.zh: ♪将我引领入此道
messages.en: ♪Lead me into this path

messages.zh: ♪远方的红色的云啊
messages.en: ♪Red clouds in the distance

messages.zh: ♪带我回到故乡
messages.en: ♪Take me home oh sweet home
What...?

messages.zh: 我已经听见了歌声，躲藏是不必要的，我没有恶意。
messages.en: I heard the song. It is unnecessary for you to hide. I mean no harm.

messages.zh: ......每个刽子手都这么说的。但最后，总是见血。
messages.en: ... That's what every killer says. But in the end, there's always bloodshed.

messages.zh: 刽子手？我不明白你的用词。我是拉特兰公证所——
messages.en: Killer? I don't understand your words. I'm from Laterano and a notary——

messages.zh: 闭嘴！你骗不了我！
messages.en: Shut up! You can't fool me!

messages.zh: 得手了！
messages.en: Got you!

messages.zh: 并没有。
messages.en: Nope.
What?!

messages.zh: 失礼了。
messages.en: Excuse my lack of manners.

messages.zh: 目标翻窗逃走，反应相当迅速。
messages.en: The target escaped through the window, they reacted quickly.

messages.zh: 环境确认。腌制的羽兽肉，鞣制用的架子，处理过的牙兽皮，手工小刀和木质工具。
messages.en: Confirmation of the environment. There are preserved feathers, tanning shelves, processed tusks, handmade knives and wooden tools.

messages.zh: 放下弓。我清楚你的位置，你埋伏在窗后。
messages.en: Put down the bow. I know where you are. You're lurking behind the window.

messages.zh: 重申一遍，我对你没有恶意。
messages.en: Again, I bear you no ill will.

messages.zh: ——不行！
messages.en: ——I refuse!

messages.zh: 你的警戒心很强。
messages.en: You have a strong vigilance.

messages.zh: 尝尝这一箭！
messages.en: Have a taste of this arrow!

messages.zh: 抓，用手抓住了箭身？
messages.en: You g-grabbed my arrow with your hand?

messages.zh: 怎么会......你究竟是什么人！
messages.en: How did... Who the hell are you?!

messages.zh: 诚如报告所说，遗嘱继承人暴躁排外，难以交流。
messages.en: Just as the report said, the heir to the will is irascible and a difficult person, and also hard to talk with.

messages.zh: 以上就是本人遗嘱的全部内容。
messages.en: As mentioned in the will.

messages.zh: 除此之外，我有一条出于私心的请求。
messages.en: In addition to this, I have a selfish request.

messages.zh: 在叙拉古的森林之中，我遇到了一位独臂的沃尔珀少女。
messages.en: In the forests of Syracuse I met a one-armed Vulpus maiden.

messages.zh: 她沉溺在对过去的复仇之中，拘泥于那片染血的土地。
messages.en: She was obsessed with revenge for the past, clinging to that bloodsoaked land.

messages.zh: 出于怜悯，我帮助了她，也许这伤害到了她的自尊，但她倔强的求生方式的确感动了我。
messages.en: Out of pity, I helped her. Maybe it hurt her self-esteem, but her stubborn way of survival really touched me.

messages.zh: 后来我意识到，我一时兴起的援助，不过是坚定了她复仇的执念，这让我寝食难安。
messages.en: Then I realized that my impulse to help had only solidified her obsession with revenge, I couldn't sleep when I realized what I've done.

messages.zh: 所以我想把我的一切赠送给她，尽管我几乎一无所有，只剩那么点可悲的遗物。
messages.en: So I wanted to give her everything I had, even though I had almost nothing but a few sad momentos.

messages.zh: ——恕我打断一下，您的亲属列表里没有沃尔珀人。这会为我们的工作带来很多麻烦。
messages.en: ——With all due respect, there are no Vulpus listed on your list of relatives. This will bring a lot of trouble to our work.

messages.zh: 所以，这只是一位膝下无子的拉特兰公民，在将死之际向公证所提出的小小请求。
messages.en: That's why this is a small request from a childless citizen of Laterano to a notary on my deathbed.

messages.zh: （他的身上，有血的气味，而且，有股讨厌的感觉......）
messages.en: (He has the smell of blood on him and, what's more, he gives me a nasty feeling... )

messages.zh: （又是来破坏我们家园的人吗，讨厌，好讨厌！）
messages.en: (Is it the people who are trying to destroy my home again?)

messages.zh: 上钩了！
messages.en: He took the bait!

messages.zh: 原来如此，又是个陷阱。似乎各个方位都有触发机关。
messages.en: I see. Another trap. There seems to be a trigger in every direction.

messages.zh: 听着！你已经走进了猎人的陷阱，不想死的话，就把你的武器放下，一步也不要动！
messages.en: Listen! You're in a hunter's trap. If you don't want to die, drop your weapon. Don't move a step!

messages.zh: 如果能方便交流，可以。
messages.en: If it helps with talking to you, sure.

messages.zh: 你是什么人？\
messages.en: Who are you? \

messages.zh: 拉特兰公证所的执行者，本次的遗嘱执行人。可以称呼我“送葬人”。
messages.en: The executor of Laterano notary, and the executor of this will. You can call me "Executor".
Laterano...?

messages.zh: “红云”，你是被委托的对象。
messages.en: "Vermeil", you are the one entrusted with this will.

messages.zh: 你为什么会知道我的名字？
messages.en: How did you know my name?

messages.zh: 你的名字由遗嘱人迪伦马特先生告知。
messages.en: Your name was given to me by Mr.Dürrenmatt, the testator.

messages.zh: 我不认识这个人。
messages.en: I don't know this person.

messages.zh: 出于某些原因，他曾使用多个化名。
messages.en: Due to reasons, he used multiple aliases.

messages.zh: 你要带我去哪里？
messages.en: Where are you taking me?

messages.zh: 出于保密要求，我不能说。
messages.en: For reasons of confidentiality, I can't say.

messages.zh: ......嘁，满嘴谎话！你就死在这里吧！
messages.en: ... *Clicks her tongue*, you're full of lies! You'll die here!

messages.zh: 我是不会离开这儿的，我的爸爸妈妈，叔叔阿姨，还有朋友，我的族人，都，都......
messages.en: I'm never leaving here, my mom and dad, my aunts and uncles, my friends, my people are, are...

messages.zh: 我的任务只是带你离开。
messages.en: My job is just to get you out of here.

messages.zh: 不要再说胡话了！你知道自己的处境吗！
messages.en: Stop talking nonsense! Do you know your situation?

messages.zh: 我处在无法进行交涉的情况下。
messages.en: I'm in a situation where I am unable to talk with you.

messages.zh: 哼，走进这片森林的，都只会是我们的猎物。
messages.en: Humph, trespassers who walk into this forest, will only be our prey.

messages.zh: 你的脚下的骨头，原本都是些野兽和坏人！
messages.en: The bones under your feet were originally beasts and bad people!

messages.zh: 理解。据点周围布满陷阱。
messages.en: Understood. Your home is surrounded by traps.

messages.zh: 落穴，绊索，土制地雷，自动飞镖。
messages.en: Pit, tripwire, landmines, automatic darts.

messages.zh: 请放心，我已经全部解除了。陷阱很初级，有伤到委托对象你的可能性。
messages.en: Please rest assured that I have disarmed them all. The trap were very basic, there is no possibility of injuring you.

messages.zh: 请跟我走。
messages.en: Please come with me.
——！Go away!

messages.zh: 再往前一步，我就射穿你！
messages.en: One more step, and I'll shoot you through!

messages.zh: 又逃了。
messages.en: She fled again.

messages.zh: 喂，你为什么要救我？
messages.en: Hey, why did you save me?

messages.zh: 毕竟我也是个猎人。
messages.en: I'm a hunter too, after all.

messages.zh: 看到一位可敬的同行失去了一只臂膀，血肉模糊地躺在一只牙兽的身边，我怎么能视而不见呢？
messages.en: How could I turn a blind eye to the sight of a worthy fellow hunter lying mangled next to a toothed beast, with an arm missing?

messages.zh: 哼......你根本不是猎人，你骗不了我。你身上没有泥土的味道。
messages.en: Hmph... You're no hunter. You can't fool me. You don't smell of dirt.

messages.zh: 哈哈，瞒不过你，但亲眼目睹那副景象的时候，我被年幼却征服了荒野的你感动了，这是实话。
messages.en: Haha, I can't hide it from you, but when I witnessed that sight, I was moved by you who conquered the wilderness with you being so young, that's the truth.

messages.zh: 那是什么意思？
messages.en: What did you say?

messages.zh: 只是我的自言自语。
messages.en: It's just me talking to myself.

messages.zh: 你脑袋上的那个圆，还有背后的装饰，是怎么回事？
messages.en: What is with the circle on your head and the decoration on your back?

messages.zh: 小家伙，你没见过拉特兰人吗？
messages.en: Kid, you never seen a Lateranian (Laterano) before?

messages.zh: 嗯。
messages.en: Yeah.

messages.zh: 这是......我抛却的故土给我留下的印记。
messages.en: This is... The mark of my homeland I left behind.

messages.zh: 人是没法抛弃家的泥土的。
messages.en: I don't believe a person could abandon their homeland.

messages.zh: 也许吧，总之，发生了很多事，来，试着站起身来吧。
messages.en: Maybe you're right. Anyways, a lot of things happened in the past. Come on, try to get up.

messages.zh: 让我来帮你装上这个。
messages.en: Let me help you install this.

messages.zh: 这是......？胳膊？铁做的胳膊？好奇怪的东西。
messages.en: This is... ? An arm? Iron arm? What a strange thing.

messages.zh: 代表我对一位荒野之子的敬意。
messages.en: In honor of a child of the wilderness.

messages.zh: 你是个修东西的？
messages.en: You're a repairman?

messages.zh: 很久以前的职责让我学会了很多东西。
messages.en: I learned a lot from my work a long time ago.

messages.zh: ......你救过我，你不是个坏人。为了报仇，我很需要一只胳膊，谢谢。
messages.en: ... You saved me. You're not a bad guy at all. I need an arm for revenge, so thank you.

messages.zh: 复仇吗......我不会指点你的命运。
messages.en: Revenge huh... I will not tell you what to do.

messages.zh: 但当你用这只手臂拉动弓弦的时候，你可以想想，除了报仇以外，我们是为什么活着。
messages.en: But when you pull your bowstring with this arm, you can think about why we live, other than revenge.

messages.zh: 想得少了，就会沦落到我今天这样。
messages.en: If you thought about it less, you'll end up where I am today.

messages.zh: 不要说什么“为了复仇而活”，这太老套了，很没意思的。
messages.en: Don't say "I live for revenge". It's such a cliche. It's not worth it.

messages.zh: ......没错，很没意思的。
messages.en: ... Yeah, it's not worth it.

messages.zh: （拉特兰......他说他是拉特兰人......）
messages.en: (Latera... he said he's Lateranian (Laterano)...)

messages.zh: （难道他真的是......)
messages.en: (Is he really...)

messages.zh: 唔！又来，好痛！
messages.en: Urgh! Again, it hurts!

messages.zh: 看来迪伦马特先生的判断是正确的。
messages.en: It seems that Mr.Dürrenmatt is right.

messages.zh: 什么？
messages.en: What?

messages.zh: 可恶，你是什么时候追到这里的？
messages.en: Damn it. When did you get here?

messages.zh: 唔！放开我！！
messages.en: Argh! Let me go!!

messages.zh: 停手吧，既然你是遗嘱继承人，我就不能伤害你。
messages.en: Please stop resisting. Since you're the heir to the will, I can't hurt you.

messages.zh: 这是他的信。
messages.en: This is his letter.

messages.zh: 为什么还要抵抗？
messages.en: Why are you still resisting?

messages.zh: ......信上有他的气味，血的气味，你对他做了什么！？
messages.en: ... The letter smells of him, smells of blood, what did you do to him! ?

messages.zh: 从拉特兰抵达这里的旅程非常漫长，气味分子不可能有所保留。
messages.en: The journey from Laterano is quite far, it's impossible for you to still smell the scent molecules.

messages.zh: 回答我！否则你会死在这里！
messages.en: Answer me! Or you'll die here!

messages.zh: 呃！
messages.en: Urgh!

messages.zh: 首先，我认为展示力量差距有助于对话成立。
messages.en: First of all, I think it's time to show the power gap between us for us to talk.

messages.zh: 其次，出于对遗嘱继承人的尊重，我可以回答你。
messages.en: Secondly, out of respect for being the heir to the will, I shall answer your question.

messages.zh: 迪伦马特先生死在手术台上，并不安详。他身患一种无法治愈的疾病。
messages.en: Mr.Dürrenmatt did not past away peacefully on the operating table, he was suffering from an incurable disease.

messages.zh: 你——！松手！
messages.en: You——! Let go!

messages.zh: 这是他的选择。
messages.en: It was his choice.

messages.zh: 喂！你，你在干嘛！
messages.en: Hey! What are y-you doing?

messages.zh: 源石已经破体而出，感染程度在加剧。
messages.en: Oripathy has spread through your body, the degree of infection is increasing.

messages.zh: 这不关你事！
messages.en: It's none of your business!

messages.zh: 如果执行对象坚持拒绝，原则上，我可以放弃。
messages.en: If the recipient target insists on rejecting, in principle, I can give up.

messages.zh: 但委托人和上司给予了我一个附属条约，我必须执行。
messages.en: But my client and boss have given me a subsidiary condition that I must execute my job.

messages.zh: ——你到底要怎么样？
messages.en: ——What do you want?

messages.zh: “让红云活下去”。
messages.en: "Let Vermeil live on."

messages.zh: 但因为要求笼统，所以实行起来很复杂，希望你能配合。
messages.en: But because the requirement is so general, carrying it out is actually very complex, I hope you can cooperate with me.

messages.zh: ......这也是那个人的委托？
messages.en: ...Is this part of your client's request?

messages.zh: 是的。他变卖了所有的财产，支付了包括公证所的额外手续费，以及你将来的治疗开销。
messages.en: Indeed. He sold all his possessions away, paid the notary office extra fees, and your future medical bills.

messages.zh: 可是，为什么？他只是路过这片森林......
messages.en: But why would he do that? He was just passing through this forest...

messages.zh: 他想让你活下去。
messages.en: He wants you to live.

messages.zh: 所以我问为什么！
messages.en: That's why I'm asking!

messages.zh: 因为他觉得你值得活下去。
messages.en: Because he thinks you have a life worth living.

messages.zh: 既然遗嘱已经传达到位，我的工作就告一段落了。
messages.en: Now that the will is known, my work is done.

messages.zh: 什......！你什么时候塞给我的——！
messages.en: What...! When did you give me this——!

messages.zh: 在下一步行动前，我必须听到你的答复。
messages.en: Before we move onto the next step, I need to hear from you first before I do my job any further.

messages.zh: “你想活下去吗？”
messages.en: "Do you want to live?"

messages.zh: 你只要回答，想，或是不想。
messages.en: You only need to answer me a yes or no.

messages.zh: 我们的时间不多。
messages.en: We don't have much time.

messages.zh: 对了，先生，我该怎么称呼你？
messages.en: By the way, Mister, what should I call you?

messages.zh: ——送葬人。如果你执意要称呼我的话。
messages.en: ——Executor. If you must.

messages.zh: 非常感谢你愿意接受我的委托。
messages.en: Thank you very much for accepting my request.

messages.zh: ——是中庭公证所做出了决定，我只是履行职责。
messages.en: ——It was the atrium notary who made the decision. I was just doing my job.

messages.zh: 哈哈，也是。在你寻找红云的过程中，我还有一个小小的请求。
messages.en: Haha, that's true. In your search for Vermeil, I have a small request.

messages.zh: ——视情况，我可能会拒绝你的口头诉求。希望你以纸面申请的形式递交公证所。
messages.en: ——depending on the circumstances, I may decline your verbal request. We hope that you can submit your application to the notary office on paper.

messages.zh: 先生可真是不留情面，没关系，只是一个小小的要求。
messages.en: That's not very kind of you, Mister. It's all right though. It's only a small request.

messages.zh: 不要告诉她关于我的过去，随便编个借口吧，比如，我死在了手术台上？
messages.en: Don't tell her about my past, just make up some excuse, like, I died on the operating table?

messages.zh: ——我不明白这其中的必要性，这也不符合你的身份。你逃避公证所多年，而且你枪杀了......
messages.en: ——I don't understand the necessity of it, and it's not in keeping with your status. You dodged notaries for years, and you shot and killed...

messages.zh: 打住。如果我说，这能为你的工作省去很多麻烦呢？
messages.en: Hold on. What if I said, this could save you a lot of trouble in your job?

messages.zh: ——如果我判断的确如此的话，我会考虑尝试。
messages.en: ——If I judge that to be the case, I will consider trying it.

messages.zh: ......所以，那个叫罗德岛的地方，真的能治疗这种奇怪的病？
messages.en: ... So, that place, Rhodes Island, can really treat this strange disease?

messages.zh: 没有人能够抵抗矿石病。但也许可以缓解痛苦。
messages.en: No one can resist Oripathy. But it might ease the pain.

messages.zh: 考虑到你先前对那些乌萨斯人所做的一切，我不建议你单独行动。
messages.en: Considering what you did to those Ursus, I don't recommend you go alone.

messages.zh: 而我正好要去罗德岛履行另一份协议。
messages.en: And I happened to be on my way to Rhodes Island to fulfill another agreement.

messages.zh: 你是在邀请我和你同行？
messages.en: Are you inviting me to go with you?

messages.zh: 我认为这十分合理。
messages.en: I think that's quite reasonable.

messages.zh: 哼，我拒绝。
messages.en: Well, I refuse.

messages.zh: 我还有很多事情要做，在离开这片土地之前，我要与族人们道别。
messages.en: I still have a lot of things to do. Before I leave this land, I want to say goodbye to my people.

messages.zh: 这里很危险，仇恨并不会因为一方的妥协而终结。
messages.en: It's dangerous here. Hatred doesn't end even when the other side gives in.

messages.zh: 哼......你知道的很清楚。
messages.en: Humph... You do know about it.

messages.zh: 无论你怎么说，别妨碍我。等到一切结束，我会去那个......罗德岛的，这样就行了吧？
messages.en: Whatever you say, don't get in my way. When it's done, I'll be going there... Rhodes Island, is that all?

messages.zh: 我在考虑。
messages.en: I'm thinking.

messages.zh: 什么？
messages.en: What?

messages.zh: 考虑如果那些亡命之徒再次找到你，我的子弹储备是否充足。
messages.en: Considering whether I have enough bullets if those desperadoes find you again.

messages.zh: 子弹......？不，你的意思是要陪着我回到荒漠！？
messages.en: Bullets... ? No, you mean to accompany me back to the desert! ?

messages.zh: 根据你的回答，你已被公证所视作接受遗嘱。
messages.en: According to your answer, you have been recognized as accepting the will.

messages.zh: 但遗嘱内容尚未履行完成，我不能放任你就这么暴露在危险中。这是我的义务。
messages.en: But the contents of the will have not been fulfilled yet, so I cannot leave you in harms way. It's my duty to protect you.

messages.zh: 我不需要你的帮助！我一直都是一个人——
messages.en: I don't need your help! I've always been alone——

messages.zh: 以及，我认为你有故意妥协，然后趁机逃走的可能。
messages.en: And I think there's a chance you're compromising and then planning to run away.

messages.zh: 啧。
messages.en: Damn.

messages.zh: 那么事不宜迟，我们出发吧。
messages.en: Then without further ado, let's go.

messages.zh: 喂！我没有答应你！我不需要你这种外人来......等等，你要去哪儿？你怎么知道那个方向的！？
messages.en: Hey! I didn't promise you! I don't need an outsider like you... Wait, where are you going? How do you know that direction! ?

messages.zh: 调查的结果。
messages.en: Investigation results.

messages.zh: 你脚下有——
messages.en: Under your feet there's a——

messages.zh: 我已经解除了陷阱，请跟上。
messages.en: I've cleared the trap. Follow me.

messages.zh: 啊啊——你这个怪人，我迟早要让你好看——！
messages.en: Arghhhh——you weirdo, I'll get you sooner or later——!

messages.zh: 请一定要照顾好她，送葬人先生。当然，也许对你而言也是一件好事。
messages.en: Please take care of her, Mr. Executor. Of course, maybe it will be a good thing for you, too.

messages.zh: 别摆出一副不理解的表情，你会明白的。
messages.en: Don't look like you don't understand. You'll understand someday.

messages.zh: 希望你们能让她脱离泥泞。别让她像我一样。
messages.en: I hope you can get her out of that place. Don't let her end up like me.

messages.zh: 正义？也许我的所作所为是有正当性的吧，先生，如果公证所能够谅解我的话。
messages.en: Justice? Perhaps I have done right, Sir, if the notary will excuse me.

messages.zh: 但那依旧不是什么值得称赞的事情，相反，正因如此，才让人生显得荒谬之极。
messages.en: But that's still not a laudable thing. On the contrary, it's what makes life seem ridiculous.

messages.zh: 但她是我的遗产。
messages.en: But she's my legacy.

messages.zh: 是我的希望。
messages.en: She is my hope.

messages.zh: 愿主保佑。
messages.en: God bless.
